Package hu.bme.mit.theta.xcfa.analysis.utils

Class OutputHandler

java.lang.Object
hu.bme.mit.theta.xcfa.analysis.utils.OutputHandler
public final class OutputHandler extends Object
This class handles the creation of output files, including - a file for the xcfa - witnesses (violation/dummy) - statistics (csv and txt) (all of these files take place in the same timestamped results directory)
